body_html:
I have face same problem and i am using torch 0.3.1 and cuda 9.1 ubuntu OS
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "main.py", line 204, in
fixed_z = netE(fixed_img_v, encoder_h_1, encoder_h_2, encoder_h_3)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 357, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/mnit/Desktop/RNN_CAAE_Pytorch_10Label/models.py", line 62, in forward
hidden1 = self.rnn1(x, hidden1)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 357, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/mnit/Desktop/RNN_CAAE_Pytorch_10Label/modules/conv_rnn.py", line 72, in forward
gates = self.conv_ih(input) + self.conv_hh(hx)
RuntimeError: The size of tensor a (32) must match the size of tensor b (20) at non-singleton dimension 0

Can any one provide solution

body:
I have face same problem and i am using torch 0.3.1 and cuda 9.1  ubuntu OS
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 204, in <module>
    fixed_z = netE(fixed_img_v, encoder_h_1, encoder_h_2, encoder_h_3)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 357, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mnit/Desktop/RNN_CAAE_Pytorch_10Label/models.py", line 62, in forward
    hidden1 = self.rnn1(x, hidden1)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 357, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mnit/Desktop/RNN_CAAE_Pytorch_10Label/modules/conv_rnn.py", line 72, in forward
    gates = self.conv_ih(input) + self.conv_hh(hx)
RuntimeError: The size of tensor a (32) must match the size of tensor b (20) at non-singleton dimension 0


Can any one provide solution
